description:
Vegapunk reveals the shocking history of the ancient giant robot and asks Luffy to take him off Egghead. Rob Lucci and his fellow Cipher Pol agents arrive at the island and ask for permission to enter the port.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eine originelle Idee! – Der Traum eines Genies!
Kisoutengai! Tensai ga Omoi Egaku Yume!
The Eccentric Dream of a Genius!
Un rêve hors du commun. L`avenir idéal vu par un génie !
奇想天外! 天才が想い描く夢!
